scenes.description: Haachama and Kiryu Coco continue the 'Pose Trials' with requests from Amane Kanata, including running towards the camera with 'tripping' faces and performing a sexy dance.
Hoshimachi Suisei joins the stream and gives Haachama a physical challenge: 100 sit-ups while Kiryu Coco holds her legs.
